sect2.title: Command explanations
sect2.para: --sysconfdir=/etc/gnome: This switch puts configuration files in /etc/gnome instead of $GNOME_PREFIX/etc.
--localstatedir=/var/lib: This switch puts ScrollKeeper files in /var/lib/scrollkeeper instead of $GNOME_PREFIX/var/scrollkeeper.
--libexecdir=/opt/gnome2/sbin: This command puts libexec files in $GNOME_PREFIX/sbin instead of $GNOME_PREFIX/libexec.
